problem_names:
lemma down_chain_imp_eq:
  fixes f :: "nat seq"
  assumes "\<forall>i. f i \<ge> f (Suc i)"
  shows "\<exists>N. \<forall>i > N. f i = f (Suc i)"

lemma inc_seq_greater:
  fixes f :: "nat seq"
  assumes "\<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i)"
  shows "\<exists>i. f i > N"
translations:
lemma down_chain_imp_eq:
  fixes f :: "nat seq"
  assumes "\<forall>i. f i \<ge> f (Suc i)"
  shows "\<exists>N. \<forall>i > N. f i = f (Suc i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
let ?F = "{f i | i. True}"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
from wf_less [unfolded wf_eq_minimal, THEN spec, of ?F]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>x.
     x \<in> {f i |i. True} \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z\<in>{f i |i. True}.
         \<forall>y.
            (y, z) \<in> {(x, y). x < y} \<longrightarrow>
            y \<notin> {f i |i. True})
obtain x where "x \<in> ?F" and *: "\<forall>y. y < x \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> ?F"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x.
     x \<in> {f i |i. True} \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z\<in>{f i |i. True}.
         \<forall>y.
            (y, z) \<in> {(x, y). x < y} \<longrightarrow>
            y \<notin> {f i |i. True})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>x.
        \<lbrakk>x \<in> {f i |i. True};
         \<forall>y<x. y \<notin> {f i |i. True}\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto
obtain N where "f N = x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>N. f N = x \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow> thesis
using \<open>x \<in> ?F\<close>
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  f N = x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  f N = x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
have "\<forall>i > N. f i \<in> ?F"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i>N. f i \<in> {f i |i. True}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f N = x
  \<forall>i>N. f i \<in> {f i |i. True}
have "\<forall>i > N. \<not> f i < x"
using *
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i>N. \<not> f i < x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i>N. \<not> f i < x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
have "\<forall>i > N. f N \<ge> f i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i>N. f i \<le> f N
using chainp_imp_rtranclp [of "(\<ge>)" f, OF assms]

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i \<le> ?j \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<lambda>x y. y \<le> x)\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f ?i) (f ?j)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i>N. f i \<le> f N
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i>N. f i \<le> f N

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>i>N. \<not> f i < x
  \<forall>i>N. f i \<le> f N
have "\<forall>i > N. f i = f (Suc i)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i>N. \<not> f i < x
  \<forall>i>N. f i \<le> f N

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
using \<open>f N = x\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i>N. \<not> f i < x
  \<forall>i>N. f i \<le> f N
  f N = x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
by (auto) (metis less_SucI order.not_eq_order_implies_strict)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>N. \<forall>i>N. f i = f (Suc i)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma inc_seq_greater:
  fixes f :: "nat seq"
  assumes "\<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i)"
  shows "\<exists>i. f i > N"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>i. N < f i
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>i. N < f i
apply (induct N)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i) \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>i. 0 < f i
 2. \<And>N.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i) \<Longrightarrow>
                \<exists>i. N < f i;
        \<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>i. Suc N < f i
apply (auto)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i) \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>i. 0 < f i
 2. \<And>N i.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i); N < f i\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>i. Suc N < f i
apply (metis neq0_conv)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>N i.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>i. f i < f (Suc i); N < f i\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>i. Suc N < f i
by (metis Suc_lessI)
end
